files.main.ts:
let item = 0
control.forever(() => {
    pins.digitalWritePin(DigitalPin.D1, 3)
    control.pause(500)
    pins.digitalWritePin(DigitalPin.D1, 0)
    control.pause(500)
    item = pins.digitalReadPin(DigitalPin.D2)
    pins.analogWritePin(AnalogPin.A5, item)
    pins.analogWritePin(AnalogPin.A0, 1023)
})
